availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, farmer. Graves County, Kentucky, native. Married to Margie Willford Carter. Father of Lafayette Carter. Farmer in Graves County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, p. 10.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, Mayfield, p. 213A.
Tennessee Death Records, 1908-1958, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Obion County Death Certificates, File 1217.
KYR-0001-020-0102.
